biotools.summary: Predicts the oncogenic status (disease-driver or neutral) of somatic point mutations in the coding and non-coding regions of the cancer genome. Enter a mutation or list of mutations (one per line) into the form below using the format chromosome,position,reference,mutant (see Help for more details). Mutations uploaded from a file should use the VCF format with a minimum of five columns (chromosome, position, id, reference, mutant).

bioschemas.name: CScape
